title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard/Serving Table of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard/Serving Table of Mahogany and Inlay
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite, on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left corner: Malcolm Forbes / IMT Inlay Serving Table / t. match 38044 sideboard mug[?] / 7/19/1901; in pen and black ink, lower right: SERVING TABLE / of Mahogany & Inlay, and below that in graphite: $100.00; in pen and black ink, right of design with arrows pointing to design: Branch Veneer Inlay / Branch Veneer Inlay; in graphite at center and left of sheet: [numerical notations indicating dimensions]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Narrow rectangular sideboard/serving table on four straight, tapering, fluted legs; cabinetry section has serpentine front with two horizontal drawers, each with pair of pulls and inlay designs at corners; patera medallion design on center of backsplash; hanging floral designs on top of front legs; separate shelf in same outline as top section slightly above floor level.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard/Serving Table of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05. Pen and black ink, graphite, on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-14
